description: silver-colored Liberty bell shaped bank with copper-colored plaque on front: "Exchange Bank, Granville, Iowa"; wood holder attached to top; engraved crack; around the top letters saying: "Proclaim Liberty throughout all the land..."
inscription:
Inscriptions

stamped onto bottom: [71630]; [TRADE MARK REGISTERED/ US PATENT OFFICE/ PAT FEB. 18- 1919/ OTHER PATENTS PENDG./ THE BANKERS SAVINGS & CREDIT SYSTEM CO./ CLEVELAND, O. U.S.A.]
title: "Liberty Bell, Exchange Bank" still bank
